Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it does not correctly identify the first and last occurrence of 'bread'. It only identifies the first occurrence and then stops the loop, and for the last occurrence, it starts from the end and stops when it finds 'bread'. This will not work when there are multiple 'bread' in the string. Generated Test cases 1-9 (9/13) should pass the buggy code, while test cases 10-13 (4/13) should fail the buggy code.
